mapper.select: select * from ( select t.*,mb.mb_cardname, c.fd_name as xffd_name from (select id, mb_cardcode,zd_code,sgd_code,xfdz_money,sj_money,yh_rate,xf_time,xf_type,sy_oprator,fd_code,xfre_money from mb_xfrecord where xf_time >= '2019-04-01 00:00:00') t left join mb_member mb on mb.mb_cardcode=t.mb_cardcode left join ls_company c on c.fd_code=t.fd_code ) tb order by tb.xf_time DESC
